themes: increasing uncertainty in national arts funding
existential threat to small and emerging organizations
barriers for new and unproven initiatives
equity and vibrancy in Austin's creative community
key_phrases: The national landscape for nonprofit arts funding has grown increasingly uncertain
existential challenge for small and emerging arts organizations
difficult it is to access traditional philanthropic funding
local support, from both the Austin community and organizations like ACME, is more crucial than ever
expanding the number of grants available
making the application process more accessible and user-friendly
take more risks on newer artists and organizations
Supporting emerging talent isn’t just equitable, it’s essential for keeping Austin’s creative community vibrant and forward-thinking
barriers_identified: foundations hesitant to invest in new or unproven initiatives
solutions_proposed: expand the number of grants available
make the application process more accessible and user-friendly
take more risks on newer artists and organizations
